content.raw:
Some notes:

* It would be good to build against the default branch of math, common, msgs and transport for now, so we're up-to-date with them
* For reference, pipelines is [running](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/039f8877d173f9d759e74487328557e727a7acdb/bitbucket-pipelines.yml?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) for ign-gui on Xenial, but I can't run tests due to the lack of X-server
* Ign-gui has support for coverage, it would be cool to have a coverage job
* Ign-gui won't build on windows at the moment, we need common to build first.
* Not sure what's the current status on homebrew, but I remember @iche033 was able to build it a while back
content.html:
Some notes:

  • It would be good to build against the default branch of math, common, msgs and transport for now, so we're up-to-date with them
  • For reference, pipelines is running for ign-gui on Xenial, but I can't run tests due to the lack of X-server
  • Ign-gui has support for coverage, it would be cool to have a coverage job
  • Ign-gui won't build on windows at the moment, we need common to build first.
  • Not sure what's the current status on homebrew, but I remember @iche033 was able to build it a while back
